h3_set_password: One last step! Create your platform password.
modal_content_failed_with_email_link: Please confirm whether you have clicked the email verification link. If you do not receive the verification email, please contact mindtrix.xyz@gmail.com.
modal_content_successful_verify: Successfully activate your account. Let's free your mind to create treasures in the forest!
modal_title_failed_with_unknown_error: Couldn't verify your identity as a creator.
p_content_set_password: This password will be used as a two-stage verification for important operations, such as: listing digital creations, deleting accounts. When you create an account for the first time, it may take a few seconds for the platform to sync your podcast information.
